title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: In one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k?

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Around the corner the Halving... in my case, wait for the end of the year 2023 and see how 2024 develops, but this type of movement, 24% in just a few hours, is an indicator that we could have a closing very close to 40k, for this end of the year 2023.This matter is very individual in the interest of each one, as I said my expectations are to 2024-2025 where it is expected to have the so anxious 6 figures for bitcoin.

comments.author: Maidak
comments.body: I prefer bitcoin to keep falling rather than rising because this is a war, falling prices will make many people give up and dump their bitcoins, and it's also a golden time for us to accumulate cheap bitcoins. It may sound harsh or too cruel, but we should not deny that this is a market with winners and losers. And if we want to win, we need to let others lose. Regarding the price prediction for this year, I still believe that history will repeat itself, there will be a serious dumping before the halving takes place.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Well, this week was full of good news and still even in the last days, news are keep coming, which have pushed the Price of BTC to break its resistances and now AFAIK it set a resistance of 30800$, and in my POV, this resistance will be break too, maybe after some correction but the chances of correction are seems to be less even in the next week.Overall, i think market will still provide us some good opportunities to take entry in the remaining months of 2023 and this would be good too for institutional investors. They have already accumulated so much BTC and still i think they will fill there bags. BTC might touch $40k too, and will provide many crypto newbies a chance to book some profit and believe me this is a trap, when newbies have long term planes but after watching big profits in there portfolio they felt greedy and sell of there assets from there big institute will accumulate more.

comments.author: Wend
comments.body: This is the 2nd time this year bitcoin has rallied and surprised us, but that is no reason for us to be optimistic this year. For me, even if bitcoin hits $40k, I wouldn't expect too much for the rest of the year when we look at the state of the world economy and what history has shown us. I don't put too much faith and hope in something breakthrough this year. I am still aiming for the halving and will only believe that the bulls will come just 1 year after the halving.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Yeah, the Bitcoin price is very volatile as the market is always dynamic, so as long as one is in it for the long term, I don't think it really matters to be very speculative for a high price right now. I used to see Bitcoin as though it could reach $40k or $50k before the end of 2023, but I think it should save all the bullish movement for the next halving season. Even if Bitcoin does reach $50k this year, I think I would not really take advantage of it because my sell target is not $50k; rather, I still want to buy more. If the price goes so high, then I would be buying just a few little fractions, compared to if I had bought at $25k.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Personally, I am optimistic about the current situation. We have already seen two times this year where Bitcoin passed the 30k mark, and this marks the third significant rally. The first one was in January, with a rise from 16.5k to 23k, and the second took place in March, with an increase from 20k to 28k. Given these trends, I believe there is a good chance that we will hold the 30k level this time, and the next rally might even push us closer to 40k before the year ends. Who knows, maybe even more!

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMWhat is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? None TBH because I don't know what to expect.Does anybody expected that Bitcoin's price will go up that high this week? None I guess. Does anybody expect that Bitcoin will surpass the $30,000 price for quite some time? None I guess. Well, it's a good news for us short term Bitcoin holders that it went up significantly this week because we manage to sold some of our Bitcoins, but after this small rally I expect a bit of a correction. The good thing though is that it's pretty obvious that the bulls are currently having the momentum, and we might see more upwards movement in the weeks to come.How high can Bitcoin go next year? This is a bold prediction, but we might see Bitcoin reaching the past ATH at that year. Well, it's a prediction and it always has a 50% chance that it might go wrong, but I just want to be optimistic, and after all we don't know what price it will reach at that time. Let's just watch the show, and wait for Bitcoin to reach 6 digits again.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMIn one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? This is something a question which no one could answer and this is why whenever you do see that there's some price drop then it would be wise that we do better to make out some opportunity on accumulating more.Yes, this current year 2023 does have lots of events which it do pertaining or connects about economical matters which is mostly get involving those main huge countries like US and China and other which are really thattending to dive once again on this market. We've seen banning and SEC issues but still in the end they do end up on launching their own crypto exchange which is utter shit kind of u-turn of events.Expecting something? Yes, they would later on making some announcement about crackdowns and ban and on the time these fellas had placed themselves on the bottom then this is where they do announce some bullish news. Rinse and repeat.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMIn one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? Admit it or not, definitely everyone is looking for bitcoin to continue it's bullish sentiments, although we are not yet in the bull run.So maybe around $50k at the end of the year is not that bad. Currently there is a renewed positive sentiments as we reach $30k in just 2 days from $26k. So if this pattern continues then there is a big possibility that we might see a good end price.Nevertheless, we need to be cautious as well, we don't know what the future holds. So just better be prepared if $50k is a hit or miss this December.

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMWhat is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin?Everyone must have different desires related to bitcoin this year, because this year is a very decisive year for investors. Because this year, there are two camps that will have different desires. The first camp definitely wants the price of bitcoin to rise, because maybe the investor is a short-term bitcoin investor, and maybe that person has no intention of adding bitcoin assets, so their main goal is to sell their assets. While the second camp, definitely wants the price of bitcoin to fall this year, because so they can buy bitcoin, to add assets and prepare for the upcoming bitcoin halving. I think that's what this year is going to be like with bitcoin investors.QuoteA lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? Maybe in the next few weeks the increase in bitcoin prices will continue, because if you look at the state of the bitcoin market, it looks very likely that it will continue to rise, for the next few weeks. but for this year I think the price of bitcoin will decrease first. And the bitcoin price for this year according to my analysis will not pass the price of $ 40k.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMIn one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? Those numbers are possible, we are around in the $30k'ish range or even surpassed it already. Long term, I'm expecting that at least the rest of 2023 will be crazy price run to $50k. Remember that next year, the block halving will commence, so by this time, everyone should be in the accumulation phase. So wise investors might continue to stack sats, regardless of the price and so with that, price could be around $40k-$50k. So take this opportunity, we just have to DCA and have the mental toughness to buy and look for the long run.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: We are now halfway through the year, and the price of bitcoin has not yet exceeded my expectations. The current price increase indicates a positive increase along the chart; I just hope it doesn't fall back in a brief period of time. With one week left in the month, if the price remains in the $30-$35 level, I believe we may still reach $50 before the end of the year.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: Quote from: famososMuertos on June 22, 2023, 02:41:18 PMAround the corner the Halving... in my case, wait for the end of the year 2023 and see how 2024 develops, but this type of movement, 24% in just a few hours, is an indicator that we could have a closing very close to 40k, for this end of the year 2023.This matter is very individual in the interest of each one, as I said my expectations are to 2024-2025 where it is expected to have the so anxious 6 figures for bitcoin.The price went up 24% just because of the blackrock news. To me this just shows that the cryptocurrency market is very manipulative. No one knows for sure if bitcoin etf from the big boys is a good thing or not. As you said, there will be a halving next year. I don't think we should expect any serious growth before that event. The price can either rise or fall.

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMIn one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? I don't know what other people's expectations will be for the rest of the year for Bitcoin, but I just wish Bitcoin the best it can continue to exist. Especially in terms of price improvement which could continue to occur slowly over the rest of the year, in which case I would generally still expect a bigger price increase than the current price for the remainder of the next six months.QuoteA lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? It will probably last a long time, although it's likely not to last too long. But as for speculating a price increase for the rest of the year, I'd just be more confident to say $40K because a price increase always takes more time than a decrease which only takes a moment. Nonetheless, the possibility for over $40K is also possible for Bitcoin in the next six months of the year.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PM~snip~How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? You opened a topic a week ago Bitcoin - how low will we go in 2023?, and now you ask the completely opposite question in a new topic, and you expect some meaningful answer as if someone has magical powers that can predict the future...Considering that you are planning to hold (and you have already written that countless times) in the long term, what does it even matter what happens by the end of the year? Even the birds on the branch know that the real show could start only next year, but that is probably your next topic.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMHow high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? I am sure that if the price had fallen below 23K, expectations would have turned 180 degrees, and we have all heard of prices such as 14K, 17K, and 22K. Therefore, do not let feelings control you, if the price increases, you greed, and if the price decreases, you panic.The price has already increased a lot since the beginning of the year, so we are now on the rise, and it is not required that we test the $40,000 levels.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMIn one week we will be half through the year , crazy I know  What is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin? A lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?How high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k?       -  No one in this forum knows that, that's the truth. Now, it's up to you if you believe others who say that this year will be like this Bitcoin value, all is depends on you. Why do you expect Bitcoin's value to be before the end of this year?Maybe, if you are a long-term holder I am pretty sure you won't have a problem with such questions, because you have a timeframe when you will hold the Bitcoin you have, because you don't care if any Fud or good news happens in Bitcoin or cryptocurrency market.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Yesterday there was bitcoin pumping and since the start of the week but I am not so excited for that like most people feel. I don't know what is leading the pump and so it will be prediction for where the price of bitcoin will end this year. I think the price pump can later drop for correction and the price become stable around $25,000 and $30,000.

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMWhat is everyone expecting for the rest of 2023 with Bitcoin?Continue to increase until it can pass the resistance of $ 35k and reach the price of $ 40k as the initial price target entering 2024.Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMA lot of good news lately with Bitcoin up 24% in a week but will it last?This week many people were surprised by the uprightness of the graph than usual.The starting point of the upward price movement started at $26,758 on the 20th at 22:00:29 and stopped at $30,380 on the 22nd at 00:00:23.After arriving there, the chart started moving sideways until recently.Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on June 22, 2023, 02:18:46 PMHow high can we go before 2024? $40k? $50k? IMO, my $40k price guess is before 2024.
